docs.title: Opes Rules and Data Processing Policy
docs.description: Read the terms of service of LLC Opes holding
docs.rules: These Terms constitute a legally binding agreement between the User, the Investor and Opes. The Terms govern the use of Opes services available to the User, Investor in or through the Personal Account. The Opes Services may be provided by Opes or, if specified in these Terms, any Web Service, Mobile Application Terms or any additional terms. By registering in the Personal Account, gaining access to its functionality and/or using the Opes Services, the User, Investor agrees that he has read, understood and accepted these Terms, as well as any additional documents or conditions mentioned in these Terms. The User, Investor acknowledges and agrees that he will be bound by these Terms and will comply with them, in accordance with periodic updates and changes to the Terms, which Opes has the right not to notify in advance. If the User, Investor does not understand and accept these Terms in full, the User, Investor should not register in the Personal Account or access its functionality or any Opes Service.
docs.webService: Web service is software that provides access to its functions via the Internet using open protocols and interfaces, specially designed and adapted primarily for stationary devices: laptops, personal computers.
docs.mobApp: Mobile application - software downloaded by the User, Investor independently from specialized mobile application stores, such as: App Store (controlled by Apple) and Google Play (controlled by Google) and other application stores, providing access to its functions via the Internet using open protocols and interfaces, specially designed and adapted primarily for use on smartphones, tablets and other portable devices.
docs.lk: Personal account is an information resource controlled by Opes, which is a set of screens/pages that are accessible only to the user who has registered on the site and then logged in on a special screen/page, thereby confirming his identity.
docs.account: User account, investor account - a set of data about the user/investor stored in the database, necessary for his identification (authentication) and providing access to his personal data and settings in the Personal Account.
docs.user: User is an individual who has registered and logged into the Personal Account, but has not created an investment lockup.
docs.investor: Investor is an individual who has registered and logged into his Personal Account and created an investment lockup.
docs.money: Cash - the amount of funds of the User, Investor used to carry out transactions in the Personal Account, presented as a decimal number with 2 (two) decimal places, expressed in the form of a cryptocurrency token issued by Tether Limited, intended for use as a stable digital asset, the price of which is pegged to the US dollar.

partners.title: Affiliate program
partners.description: Remuneration for attracted partners who have active lockups is accrued from the 15th to the 20th of the current month, for the previous one
partners.descriptionMore: Rewards are automatically transferred to your wallet account

history.title: History
history.description: Displaying important events in your Opes personal account

investments.title: Investments
investments.description: Open an investment lockup with a yield of 40% of the profit on your investment per month
investments.openDescription: Open an investment lockup with a yield of 40% of the profit from your investments per month.
investments.halalDescription: Trading does not use leverage and does not involve speculative (short) operations - cryptocurrency trading is an absolutely halal business according to Islam.
investments.addHalal: Replenishment of existing lockups is available.
investments.halalMark: The profitability received over the past month is added to the lockup amount. After the lockup is completed, the lockup amount is automatically transferred to your wallet account
investments.standardMark: The profit received for the last month is automatically transferred to your wallet account
investments.opportunity: A unique feature of OPES - you can change the type of interest payment for existing lockups.

successForm.resetPassword: A message with instructions has been sent to your email.
